awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Jaime Escalante is a mathematics teacher in a school in a Hispanic neighbourhood. Convinced that his students have potential, he adopts unconventional teaching methods help gang members and no-hopers pass the rigorous Advanced Placement exam in calculus.
plot: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.
title: Stand and Deliver
